ModMetaData.name: Honorbound
ModMetaData.author: Vesper
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a meme that finally lets you be more of a goody two-shoes but also promoting military growth, essentially a more advanced Supremacist meme. Show those evil raiders what for.
Incompatible with the following memes: Supremacist, Raider, Violent Conversion*, Nationalist*, Blood Court*, Vow of Nonviolence*, Sadist*, and Pirate*.
Requires one of precepts: - Charity: Essential - Charity: Important - Charity: Worthwhile
Requires one of precepts: - Slavery: Disapproved - Slavery: Horrible - Slavery: Abhorrent
Requires one of precepts**: - Violence: Disapproved - Violence: Abhorrent
Requires precept: - Execution: Horrible if innocent - Raiding: Pragmatic***
Unlocked roles: - Shooting specialist - Melee specialist
*These memes are from Vanilla Expanded mods or the Alpha Memes mod, but will work without them. **This precept only applies if VE Memes and Structures is installed, and only applies to attacking non-hostile humanoid pawns unprovoked ***This Raiding precept works differently from the regular one: There are no negative moodlets for not raiding in a long time, and raiding has seperate mood buffs and debuffs depending on if the raid was against a hostile, neutral, or allied settlement or worksite.
